column4: I've managed to get the Live CD of Ubuntu working, but how do I view my files under Windows?
Sorry, but how would I go about doing so?
No, this is Ubuntu's live CD
I want to test that everything works before migrating fully
go to places->computer and see if you can view hard disk images :)
it should just show up in there and mount when you browse to it.
you can read but not write to ntfs though.
I can't view hard disk images, its a Windows partition
yeah, those, they should be in Places->Computer?
they are not in Places > Computer
do you have windows programs you need?
Linux won't run Windows programs; wine is a toy as of yet.
ah good.  You've done your researhc.
you need to be root to do that
